All registered local repositories must be running." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Force delete</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_IPC_FORCE_DELETEs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Deletes a global repository and unregisters local repositories. All registered local repositories must be running.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="UC4RB_IPC_IGNORE_EMPTYs.00" nl="1" text="Skip if repository is empty" tooltip="If selected yes,Action ends successfully if repository content is already deleted" required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Skip if repository is empty</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_IPC_IGNORE_EMPTYs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">If selected yes,Action ends successfully if repository content is already deleted</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup></readpanel></dialog>

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_IPC_FORCE_DELETEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_IPC_FORCE_DELETE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_IPC_FORCE_DELETEs.00><UC4RB_IPC_IGNORE_EMPTYs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_IPC_IGNORE_EMPTY#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">YES</UC4RB_IPC_IGNORE_EMPTYs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>
